body.p: NVM Express read requests are received from the Submission Queue Manager by the Data Managers. The Data Managers break these requests in to Data Frame read requests and issue them to the Mapping Managers. The Mapping Managers issue the flash read operations and reply back to the Data Managers when the read operations are complete. The Data Managers then DMA the data to the host system's memory and issue a completion to the host via the Completion Queue Manager. See for the complete details of this flow.
